meanings.definition: A line of stitching on the outside of a garment or piece of fabric, typically done for decorative or reinforcing purposes.
meanings.sent1: The topstitch on the jacket added a nice touch of style.
meanings.sent2: She admired the neat topstitch on the hem of the dress.
meanings.sent3: The topstitch on the pillow looked like a little row of soldiers standing guard.
meanings.sent4: The topstitch was like a colorful border framing the edge of the tablecloth.
meanings.sent5: The topstitch stood out, making the bag look professionally crafted.

meanings.definition: To sew a line of stitching on the outside of a garment or piece of fabric.
meanings.sent1: She will topstitch the edges of the quilt for added durability.
meanings.sent2: Remember to topstitch along the seam to keep it flat.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally topstitched his sleeve to his shirt while sewing in a hurry.
meanings.sent4: The tailor topstitched the cuffs with precision, like a skilled artist.
meanings.sent5: The seamstress topstitched the pockets, ensuring they would not fray.
